summary: This module provides 8-bit clean, case-insensitive string comparison functions (sm_strcasecmp and sm_strncasecmp) that serve as replacements for standard C library functions. The implementation uses a character mapping array to perform case-insensitive comparisons.

logs.reason: This is an RCS ID string used for version identification of the file. It's not an actual log message but could be surfaced in version information.
logs.resolution: This is informational only and not an error; no resolution required.
